headline: Invesco’s 276% ETF Flips Normal S&P 500 Rules And Still Wins Big | PRF, VOO
summary: When market volatility sends speculative stocks on wild rides and mega-cap tech names dominate headlines, some investors look for a different approach: fundamental indexing. Invesco RAFI US 1000 ETF (NYSEARCA:PRF) offers exposure to U.S. large-cap stocks weighted not by market capitalization, but by fundamental metrics like sales, cash flow, and dividends. The question is whether ... Invesco’s 276% ETF Flips Normal S&P 500 Rules And Still Wins Big | PRF, VOO
